title: Norris and Piastri F1 clash was only a matter of time
summary: “Yes, we said a few times that it wasn’t a matter of ‘if’ there was going to be contact between Oscar and Lando but ‘when’ and we now know the…

qa_pairs.question: Which two drivers were involved in a clash during a recent F1 event?
What is a common phrase used to describe the inevitability of a clash between teammates in F1?
Which team do Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri drive for in Formula 1?
